error_text: Please choose one of the two segmentation maps.
iview_help_dialog_wl_message: Window/Level (Brightness/Contrast) Tool: Hold the right mouse button and drag.
iview_help_dialog_pan_message: Pan Image Tool: Hold the left mouse button and drag.
iview_help_dialog_zoom_message: Zoom In/Out Tool: Scroll the mouse wheel.
iview_help_dialog_rotate_message: Rotate Tool: Hold middle mouse click and drag.
iview_help_dialog_restore_message: Restore Image Transformations: Click on the appropriate button below the image viewer.
